description: This bot zips a folder into a ZIP archive.

it.shortDescription: Comprimi cartelle e file in archivi ZIP con un singolo comando.
it.longDescription: Zipper crea rapidamente archivi ZIP pronti da condividere o salvare, senza dover ricordare opzioni complesse da riga di comando.

en.shortDescription: Compress folders and files into ZIP archives with a single command.
en.longDescription: Zipper quickly creates shareable ZIP archives without needing to remember complex command-line flags.
